sentences.sentence: Can you think I would be so heartlessly treacherous?
sentences.translation: 难道你认为我会那样残酷地背信弃义？

sentences.sentence: And she couldn't just have tossed it so heartlessly - she was sick with the possibility of having to do so.
sentences.translation: 所以它不能这么无情地把它丢弃——它很伤心也许不得不这么做。

sentences.sentence: Now, when the year heartlessly engraves the scar on her face the time, only then discovered old is a how fearful devil.
sentences.translation: 现在，当岁月无情地在她脸上刻下伤痕的时候，才发现苍老是一个多么可怕的魔鬼。
